mapper.select: SELECT ae.emp_no AS empNo , ae.user_id AS userId , ae.emp_name AS empName , ae.position_cd AS positionCd , p.position_name AS positionName , p.level_no AS positionLevel FROM approval_emp ae INNER JOIN positions p ON ae.position_cd = p.position_cd WHERE ae.user_id = #{userId} AND ae.user_pw = #{userPw}
